(animal [animal], magic-being [magicbeing], ethereal [ethereal], wolf [wolf], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], mountain-survival [mountainsurvival], snow-move [snowmove], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 misc

summoned with #781 Summon Winter Wolves (Conjuration 5)

The Winter Wolf is one of the four seasonal spirits. This large, ethereal wolf is most powerful during winter and weakest during summer. It is a magical, mindless being that must be commanded by a mage.
